comments:
Description:
  In the masterpage view, when drag an image to the  head/footer of  layout an error is thrown out

Steps to reproduce:
  1.new a report
  2. swith to the MasterPage view, drag an image from the palette to the head of the layout

Expected results:
  a image edit is poped up

Actual results:
  an error is poped up
 java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.model.views.outline.ReportElementModel

The target model can be ReportElementModel class if the target is a SlotHandle in Model api. The previous code assume the target model can only be DesignElementHanlde.
Change the code to handle the ReportElementModel case.
